name: Jumpy Cat
description:
Can you touch the sky? Help Ginger and their friends achieve their dreams of reaching space in this easy-to-pick-up but difficult-to-master game. Jump off floating platforms while avoiding air mines! If you're a pro, try using the mines to launch yourself as high as possible!

Game includes:

-Multiple unlockable skins

-Medals for reaching milestones

-Rewarded adverts allow you to keep jumping even after death!

More content coming soon...

NOTE: This game was developed for the Google Play Store. Without Google Play Services, some features may not be available.
